name: PiN-OUT
description:
Do you like Pinball and Breakout and sometimes wish you could play both at the same time?


Well, it’s your lucky day. Pin-Out combines the controls of Pinball with the gameplay of Breakout.

Time to break some Blocks!












Mouse and Keyboard:
Flippers: [A] & [D] or [<-] & [->]
Launch Ball: [SPACE]

 CREDITS
Concept & Sound: erik-clarke, streiffFaRo
Music: Waterflame - Striker/Starfall
https://www.youtube.com/user/waterflame89
Programming: oliverdemaster, raddi
Artists  & UI: bezstradaniy, orphic-yokai
